title: 'Horrible'
body: Makes the hair dry after wash . Need to hydrate the hair some other way . It's a herbal product but it same as other shampoo which have chemicals in it.

body: '4.0 out of 5 stars''DABUR VATIKA HEALTH SHAMPOO is a good natural shampoo in market with good results my favourite product using this shampoo from last 1 year onwards but recently ordered 1ltr pack from amazon a very old product which is 14 months old and near to expire sold on amazon by DABUR makes me little bit disappointed...'

title: 'Excellent'
body: Shampoo is obviously known to be good but the I bought it for the packaging I am honestly in love with refill packs so much less clutter. Hope they don't discontinue it. This is so much better

title: 'Affordable shampoo for big family'
body: It's affordable shampoo for big family. While I don't prefer chemically loaded shampoo for my hair as it makes my hair rough and dry. So after using it you should definitely massage your hair with coconut oil as moisturizer or as a conditioner.
